verses.text_madani: ق ۚ وَالْقُرْآنِ الْمَجِيدِ
verses.translation: Qaf. I swear by the glorious Quran (that Muhammad is the Messenger of Allah)

verses.text_madani: بَلْ عَجِبُوا أَن جَاءَهُم مُّنذِرٌ مِّنْهُمْ فَقَالَ الْكَافِرُونَ هَٰذَا شَيْءٌ عَجِيبٌ
verses.translation: Nay! they wonder that there has come to them a warner from among themselves, so the unbelievers say: This is a wonderful thing:

verses.text_madani: أَإِذَا مِتْنَا وَكُنَّا تُرَابًا ۖ ذَٰلِكَ رَجْعٌ بَعِيدٌ
verses.translation: What! when we are dead and have become dust? That is afar (from probable) return.

verses.text_madani: قَدْ عَلِمْنَا مَا تَنقُصُ الْأَرْضُ مِنْهُمْ ۖ وَعِندَنَا كِتَابٌ حَفِيظٌ
verses.translation: We know indeed what the earth diminishes of them, and with Us is a writing that preserves.

verses.text_madani: بَلْ كَذَّبُوا بِالْحَقِّ لَمَّا جَاءَهُمْ فَهُمْ فِي أَمْرٍ مَّرِيجٍ
verses.translation: Nay, they rejected the truth when it came to them, so they are (now) in a state of confusion.

verses.text_madani: أَفَلَمْ يَنظُرُوا إِلَى السَّمَاءِ فَوْقَهُمْ كَيْفَ بَنَيْنَاهَا وَزَيَّنَّاهَا وَمَا لَهَا مِن فُرُوجٍ
verses.translation: Do they not then look up to heaven above them how We have made it and adorned it and it has no gaps?

verses.text_madani: وَالْأَرْضَ مَدَدْنَاهَا وَأَلْقَيْنَا فِيهَا رَوَاسِيَ وَأَنبَتْنَا فِيهَا مِن كُلِّ زَوْجٍ بَهِيجٍ
verses.translation: And the earth, We have made it plain and cast in it mountains and We have made to grow therein of all beautiful kinds,

verses.text_madani: تَبْصِرَةً وَذِكْرَىٰ لِكُلِّ عَبْدٍ مُّنِيبٍ
verses.translation: To give sight and as a reminder to every servant who turns frequently (to Allah).

verses.text_madani: وَنَزَّلْنَا مِنَ السَّمَاءِ مَاءً مُّبَارَكًا فَأَنبَتْنَا بِهِ جَنَّاتٍ وَحَبَّ الْحَصِيدِ
verses.translation: And We send down from the cloud water abounding in good, then We cause to grow thereby gardens and the grain that is reaped,

verses.text_madani: وَالنَّخْلَ بَاسِقَاتٍ لَّهَا طَلْعٌ نَّضِيدٌ
verses.translation: And the tall palm-trees having spadices closely set one above another,

verses.text_madani: رِّزْقًا لِّلْعِبَادِ ۖ وَأَحْيَيْنَا بِهِ بَلْدَةً مَّيْتًا ۚ كَذَٰلِكَ الْخُرُوجُ
verses.translation: A sustenance for the servants, and We give life thereby to a dead land; thus is the rising.

verses.text_madani: كَذَّبَتْ قَبْلَهُمْ قَوْمُ نُوحٍ وَأَصْحَابُ الرَّسِّ وَثَمُودُ
verses.translation: (Others) before them rejected (prophets): the people of Nuh and the dwellers of Ar-Rass and Samood,

verses.text_madani: وَعَادٌ وَفِرْعَوْنُ وَإِخْوَانُ لُوطٍ
verses.translation: And Ad and Firon and Lut's brethren,

verses.text_madani: وَأَصْحَابُ الْأَيْكَةِ وَقَوْمُ تُبَّعٍ ۚ كُلٌّ كَذَّبَ الرُّسُلَ فَحَقَّ وَعِيدِ
verses.translation: And the dwellers of the grove and the people of Tuba; all rejected the messengers, so My threat came to pass.

verses.text_madani: أَفَعَيِينَا بِالْخَلْقِ الْأَوَّلِ ۚ بَلْ هُمْ فِي لَبْسٍ مِّنْ خَلْقٍ جَدِيدٍ
verses.translation: Were We then fatigued with the first creation? Yet are they in doubt with regard to a new creation.

verses.text_madani: وَلَقَدْ خَلَقْنَا الْإِنسَانَ وَنَعْلَمُ مَا تُوَسْوِسُ بِهِ نَفْسُهُ ۖ وَنَحْنُ أَقْرَبُ إِلَيْهِ مِنْ حَبْلِ الْوَرِيدِ
verses.translation: And certainly We created man, and We know what his mind suggests to him, and We are nearer to him than his life-vein.

verses.text_madani: إِذْ يَتَلَقَّى الْمُتَلَقِّيَانِ عَنِ الْيَمِينِ وَعَنِ الشِّمَالِ قَعِيدٌ
verses.translation: When the two receivers receive, sitting on the right and on the left.

verses.text_madani: مَّا يَلْفِظُ مِن قَوْلٍ إِلَّا لَدَيْهِ رَقِيبٌ عَتِيدٌ
verses.translation: He utters not a word but there is by him a watcher at hand.

verses.text_madani: وَجَاءَتْ سَكْرَةُ الْمَوْتِ بِالْحَقِّ ۖ ذَٰلِكَ مَا كُنتَ مِنْهُ تَحِيدُ
verses.translation: And the stupor of death will come in truth; that is what you were trying to escape.

verses.text_madani: وَنُفِخَ فِي الصُّورِ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ يَوْمُ الْوَعِيدِ
verses.translation: And the trumpet shall be blown; that is the day of the threatening.

verses.text_madani: وَجَاءَتْ كُلُّ نَفْسٍ مَّعَهَا سَائِقٌ وَشَهِيدٌ
verses.translation: And every soul shall come, with it a driver and a witness.

verses.text_madani: لَّقَدْ كُنتَ فِي غَفْلَةٍ مِّنْ هَٰذَا فَكَشَفْنَا عَنكَ غِطَاءَكَ فَبَصَرُكَ الْيَوْمَ حَدِيدٌ
verses.translation: Certainly you were heedless of it, but now We have removed from you your veil, so your sight today is sharp.

verses.text_madani: وَقَالَ قَرِينُهُ هَٰذَا مَا لَدَيَّ عَتِيدٌ
verses.translation: And his companions shall say: This is what is ready with me.

verses.text_madani: أَلْقِيَا فِي جَهَنَّمَ كُلَّ كَفَّارٍ عَنِيدٍ
verses.translation: Do cast into hell every ungrateful, rebellious one,

verses.text_madani: مَّنَّاعٍ لِّلْخَيْرِ مُعْتَدٍ مُّرِيبٍ
verses.translation: Forbidder of good, exceeder of limits, doubter,

verses.text_madani: الَّذِي جَعَلَ مَعَ اللَّهِ إِلَٰهًا آخَرَ فَأَلْقِيَاهُ فِي الْعَذَابِ الشَّدِيدِ
verses.translation: Who sets up another god with Allah, so do cast him into severe chastisement.

verses.text_madani: قَالَ قَرِينُهُ رَبَّنَا مَا أَطْغَيْتُهُ وَلَٰكِن كَانَ فِي ضَلَالٍ بَعِيدٍ
verses.translation: His companion will say: Our Lord! I did not lead him into inordinacy but he himself was in a great error.

verses.text_madani: قَالَ لَا تَخْتَصِمُوا لَدَيَّ وَقَدْ قَدَّمْتُ إِلَيْكُم بِالْوَعِيدِ
verses.translation: He will say: Do not quarrel in My presence, and indeed I gave you the threatening beforehand:

verses.text_madani: مَا يُبَدَّلُ الْقَوْلُ لَدَيَّ وَمَا أَنَا بِظَلَّامٍ لِّلْعَبِيدِ
verses.translation: My word shall not be changed, nor am I in the least unjust to the servants.

verses.text_madani: يَوْمَ نَقُولُ لِجَهَنَّمَ هَلِ امْتَلَأْتِ وَتَقُولُ هَلْ مِن مَّزِيدٍ
verses.translation: On the day that We will say to hell: Are you filled up? And it will say: Are there any more?

verses.text_madani: وَأُزْلِفَتِ الْجَنَّةُ لِلْمُتَّقِينَ غَيْرَ بَعِيدٍ
verses.translation: And the garden shall be brought near to those who guard (against evil), not far off:

verses.text_madani: هَٰذَا مَا تُوعَدُونَ لِكُلِّ أَوَّابٍ حَفِيظٍ
verses.translation: This is what you were promised, (it is) for every one who turns frequently (to Allah), keeps (His limits);

verses.text_madani: مَّنْ خَشِيَ الرَّحْمَٰنَ بِالْغَيْبِ وَجَاءَ بِقَلْبٍ مُّنِيبٍ
verses.translation: Who fears the Beneficent Allah in secret and comes with a penitent heart:

verses.text_madani: ادْخُلُوهَا بِسَلَامٍ ۖ ذَٰلِكَ يَوْمُ الْخُلُودِ
verses.translation: Enter it in peace, that is the day of abiding.

verses.text_madani: لَهُم مَّا يَشَاءُونَ فِيهَا وَلَدَيْنَا مَزِيدٌ
verses.translation: They have therein what they wish and with Us is more yet.

verses.text_madani: وَكَمْ أَهْلَكْنَا قَبْلَهُم مِّن قَرْنٍ هُمْ أَشَدُّ مِنْهُم بَطْشًا فَنَقَّبُوا فِي الْبِلَادِ هَلْ مِن مَّحِيصٍ
verses.translation: And how many a generation did We destroy before them who were mightier in prowess than they, so they went about and about in the lands. Is there a place of refuge?

verses.text_madani: إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَذِكْرَىٰ لِمَن كَانَ لَهُ قَلْبٌ أَوْ أَلْقَى السَّمْعَ وَهُوَ شَهِيدٌ
verses.translation: Most surely there is a reminder in this for him who has a heart or he gives ear and is a witness.

verses.text_madani: وَلَقَدْ خَلَقْنَا السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضَ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا فِي سِتَّةِ أَيَّامٍ وَمَا مَسَّنَا مِن لُّغُوبٍ
verses.translation: And certainly We created the heavens and the earth and what is between them in six periods and there touched Us not any fatigue.

verses.text_madani: فَاصْبِرْ عَلَىٰ مَا يَقُولُونَ وَسَبِّحْ بِحَمْدِ رَبِّكَ قَبْلَ طُلُوعِ الشَّمْسِ وَقَبْلَ الْغُرُوبِ
verses.translation: Therefore be patient of what they say, and sing the praise of your Lord before the rising of the sun and before the setting.

verses.text_madani: وَمِنَ اللَّيْلِ فَسَبِّحْهُ وَأَدْبَارَ السُّجُودِ
verses.translation: And glorify Him in the night and after the prayers.

verses.text_madani: وَاسْتَمِعْ يَوْمَ يُنَادِ الْمُنَادِ مِن مَّكَانٍ قَرِيبٍ
verses.translation: And listen on the day when the crier shall cry from a near place

verses.text_madani: يَوْمَ يَسْمَعُونَ الصَّيْحَةَ بِالْحَقِّ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ يَوْمُ الْخُرُوجِ
verses.translation: The day when they shall hear the cry in truth; that is the day of coming forth.

verses.text_madani: إِنَّا نَحْنُ نُحْيِي وَنُمِيتُ وَإِلَيْنَا الْمَصِيرُ
verses.translation: Surely We give life and cause to die, and to Us is the eventual coming;

verses.text_madani: يَوْمَ تَشَقَّقُ الْأَرْضُ عَنْهُمْ سِرَاعًا ۚ ذَٰلِكَ حَشْرٌ عَلَيْنَا يَسِيرٌ
verses.translation: The day on which the earth shall cleave asunder under them, they will make haste; that is a gathering together easy to Us.

verses.text_madani: نَّحْنُ أَعْلَمُ بِمَا يَقُولُونَ ۖ وَمَا أَنتَ عَلَيْهِم بِجَبَّارٍ ۖ فَذَكِّرْ بِالْقُرْآنِ مَن يَخَافُ وَعِيدِ
verses.translation: We know best what they say, and you are not one to compel them; therefore remind him by means of the Quran who fears My threat.
